-#
-# architecture mapped to their endianness
-x86=little
-x86_64=little
-amd64=little
-arm=little
-aarch64=little
-loongarch64=little
-ppc64le=little
-riscv32=little
-riscv64=little
-ppc=big
-ppc64=big
-s390=big
-s390x=big
-sparc=big
-sparcv9=big

@@ -0,0 +1,36 @@

+#
+# osname-architecture mapped to their endianness
+aix-ppc64=big
+linux-aarch64=little
+linux-arm=little
+linux-amd64=little
+linux-ppc64le=little
+linux-s390x=big
+linux-x86=little
+macos-aarch64=little
+macos-amd64=little
+windows-amd64=little
+windows-x86=little
